bibl.title: The Nahman Alexander. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Two heads from the first half of the Ptolemaic period: - Private American Collection, marble, 28 cm (Hermopolis?); - Alexandria, Graeco-Roman Museum, Inv. 3242, granite, 34 cm (Alexandria?). - Observations on the mixed style and on the ephebic Alexander as a model for other Ptolemaic royal images.
bibl.seg: BIANCHI Robert Steven, The Nahman Alexander. Avec résumé en anglais.

Two heads from the first half of the Ptolemaic period: - Private American Collection, marble, 28 cm (Hermopolis?); - Alexandria, Graeco-Roman Museum, Inv. 3242, granite, 34 cm (Alexandria?). - Observations on the mixed style and on the ephebic Alexander as a model for other Ptolemaic royal images.
